overview: "I have always been inappropriate - more or less voluntarily - now I am again."  It's Frank Hvam, as himself - a composite comedian, combining the lavkomiske with the gifted - an unpredictable mix of genitals and policy, seasoned with a highly developed sense of their own idiocy.  "It's not because I like to provoke, but I am convinced that in the end it probably is very healthy to say things out loud. I get it every to trap better. "  A classic stand-up show about what we all think, but few of us want to say out loud.
title: Frank Hvam - Inappropriate
